plot outline: The film centres around a TV channel executive, the host and the executive producer who have a TV reality show; a competition broadcasting the day in the life of a middle class patriarch Nana. Nana is a retired lecturer, who lives happily with his family members. He agrees to be part of the show very reluctantly, only on the insistence of his young granddaughter who wants him to win the crown, though Nana is totally against the reality circus. The TV reality show team arrive at Nana's palatial bungalow with their camera equipment. But strange happenings take place in Nana's life beyond his comprehension. Who is behind these strange chain of events? Does Nana win the crown for his granddaughter? What is Nana's family's reaction about this reality show?
title: Ashi Fasli Nanachi Tang
akas: Ashi Fasli Nanachi Taang (India, Marathi title)
plot: The film centres around a TV channel executive, the host and the executive producer who have a TV reality show; a competition broadcasting the day in the life of a middle class patriarch Nana. Nana is a retired lecturer, who lives happily with his family members. He agrees to be part of the show very reluctantly, only on the insistence of his young granddaughter who wants him to win the crown, though Nana is totally against the reality circus. The TV reality show team arrive at Nana's palatial bungalow with their camera equipment. But strange happenings take place in Nana's life beyond his comprehension. Who is behind these strange chain of events? Does Nana win the crown for his granddaughter? What is Nana's family's reaction about this reality show?

G.L TV has become number one channel in Maharashtra so its CEO decides to come up with a new show Spardha Saah Sukhanchi which will be led by Poonam and actor Yash whose an household name to everyone.They receive around 1000 applications and one of which gets finalized is of Nana Joshi whose granddaughter has filled the form without his knowledge and claim that they have all kind off happiness.Nana at first disagrees but later decides to be part of it he lives happily with his wife Nani,son Kedar his wife Kasturi and a granddaughter Mau,Yash enters their house as an observer for this game show and sees that nothing can break their family.Until one day Rajlakshmi Aishwariya Rane Jagirdar arrives and claims Nana to be her husband putting everyone in limbo.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com

'Ashi Fasli Nana Chi Taang' is a comedy entertainer based on a TV reality show where Nana, a retired lecturer participates in a reality show fully supported by his family members. Nana meets many famous personalities till there is a twist in the tale.
